title: AeroPress
description: One of the simplest and fastest ways of brewing coffee. The Aeropress is a convenient one-cup pour over that gives you a flavoursome and super clean taste in the cup. It comes with a stirring paddle, a measuring scoop, a funnel and filter papers.

title: Filter Papers for Kalita Wave
description: The Kalita Wave Filters give the Kalita Wave Drippers their style and functionality. The filters are designed to sit suspended above the bottom of the dripper while increasing temperatures stability by keeping most water contact away from the outer wall of the dripper.

title: Online Gift Card [SG]
description: Shopping for the coffee lover in your life, but not sure how they brew? Or maybe you're wanting to buy them a CMCR Academy Class to choose for themselves; give the gift of choice with a CMCR Online gift card and be assured they'll find something to put to good use. Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Gift cards bought online can be used for 1 year from the date of purchase. PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS AN ONLINE GIFT CARD AND CAN NOT BE REDEEMED IN OUR CAFES AND COFFEE SUBSCRIPTIONS, HOWEVER, IT CAN BE USED FOR PAYMENT ON ANY OF OUR PRODUCTS ONLINE OR ACADEMY CLASSES IN SINGAPORE ONLY.

title: Incasa Milk Jug
description: Stainless steel milk jugs designed specifically for the coffee professional and latte artist. Coming in three different sizes, the 1ltr Incasa milk jug is designed for steaming milk for two 200ml cups (and maybe a bit more), whilst the 600ml and 400ml jugs are for single cup steaming and finer latte art work.

title: VST Baskets
description: Baskets for consistent extraction. VST’s new precision filters deliver consistent extraction performance over a wide range of concentration with reduced sediment. Specifications & Features Each VST filter is marked with a unique 2-D code to ensure authenticity and performance. 2-D code stores factory measurement, quality reports and image data. Designed to extract properly as a ristretto, normale or lungo with minimal or no change in grind setting at a fixed dose. Filters are matched for total square area to +/- 5% to ensure identical performance (typical variances of standard filters range from 50-200% of nominal). All VST Filters are warranted for one year and for zero defects. Holes are fabricated using a new micro-machine and finishing process. 100% of holes are measured on every filter for min/max range limits on area and diameter to a precision of +/- 30 Âµm (Unique QC report provided with every filter). All holes are measured for circularity, placement, square area and blocked h

title: Santo Antonio, Brazil
description: Tasting Notes: Dark Chocolate, Cacao and Nougat COFFEE INFORMATION Country Brazil Farm / Farms Sul de Minas Gerais Altitude 1150 MASL Variety Bourbon, Mundo Novo, Caturra Processing Natural This coffee comes from a collection of well organised estates based around the small town of Santo Antonio do Amparo in the south of the state of Minas Gerais. Working as a group has enabled these estates to share their years of experience and expertise, ensuring that the best potential quality is achieved on each individual farm. As a result, their collective harvests continue to build a reputation and profile of high speciality standards from the region their families have called home for generations. Their state-of-the-art cupping lab, which is equipped with the latest technology in colour analysis, roasting, grading and cupping, employs a full time cupper, Q grader and quality control manager and is located in Santo Antonio do Amparo. They also collectively own their own dry-mill, warehouse and

title: Clever Coffee Dripper Large - 18oz
description: The Clever Coffee Dripper is a free standing, one cup filter with one very important addition — a valve that keeps your brew from drawing down until you activate it by sitting it on a cup. What's so good about that? Well, the way the valve works means that you can control all the variables of your brew independently of each other. No matter which brewing method you're using, it always comes down to the same variables — grind size, the amount of coffee you dose, water weight, water temperature and the amount of time that the water and coffee are in contact. The set includes 100 pcs of filter paper.

title: Subscription for Signature Blends
description: Make your selection from one of our four, signature specialty coffee blends and we will ensure it is freshly roasted and sent out to you at your desired frequency. To make things easy, here is the flavour profile for each of our blends: 22 Martin Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts & Molasses Lucky Basterd Floral, Blueberries & Tropical Fruit Country Cousin Black Tea, Cherry & Candied Fruit CMCR Espresso Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit & Milk Chocolate Each of our blends lend themselves well to being enjoyed as either a milk-based beverage or as a black, however if you need a little guidance, our recommendation would be that the blends with chocolate notes will give you a classic rich and full bodied milk-based coffee experience, whereas the more fruit dominant blends make for a tasty espresso or long black.

To make things easy, here is the flavour profile for each of our blends: 22 Martin Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts & Molasses Lucky Basterd Floral, Blueberries & Tropical Fruit Country Cousin Black Tea, Cherry & Candied Fruit CMCR Espresso Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit & Milk Chocolate Each of our blends lend themselves well to being enjoyed as either a milk-based beverage or as a black, however if you need a little guidance, our recommendation would be that the blends with chocolate notes will give you a classic rich and full bodied milk-based coffee experience, whereas the more fruit dominant blends make for a tasty espresso or long black.

title: Subscription for Single Origin  [Espresso Roast]
description: Let our Roasters select a single origin for you and have it delivered at your desired frequency. You can choose to have delivery once a week, fortnightly or monthly, and what's even better is you get to save 10% on all your orders. This is an excellent way to explore our rotating range of single origins, and remove the hassle of remembering to order, never be left without great coffee at your home or office again!

title: Egg 300ml Latte Cup & Saucer Set
description: Made of high fired quality porcelain, the Egg range is strong and durable, while its thick walls are able to maintain beverage temperature and ensure a great taste. The classic choice for professional and home baristas High fired porcelain, durable restaurant grade quality Round inner-base, with a perfect curvature for pouring latte art Available in 10 colours Extra thickness to keep coffee hot The World Latte Art Championship official cups

title: Egg 300ml Latte Cup & Saucer Set
description: Made of high fired quality porcelain, the Egg range is strong and durable, while its thick walls are able to maintain beverage temperature and ensure a great taste. title: Pullman Tamper (Base + Handle)
description: Simply the best tampers on the planet. Designed and manufactured in Australia, the Pullman Tamper is an ergonomic joy with a comfortable curve running throughout all its components; and now you can build your own with two different base options (58mm & Big Step) and seven colour options (burgundy, cobalt, stealth, forest, argent, oak & jarrah) for the handle. The 58mm base comes with engraved lines on the side of the base to make dosing and tamping consistent every time. In addition, there’s also the option to add one of the three height adjustment spacers between the base and the handle. This feature is supplied with each tamper and provides a total of four different height combinations over an 8mm range. The BigStep base refers to the design of the larger diameter 'stepped edge' of the base, measuring in at 58.55mm (+/- 0.02mm). This base shape enables a maximum surface area of coffee to be covered during tamping, including the prevention of a pinched edge of coffee particles or vacu

title: Cafetto Commercial Cleaner 1kg
description: Premium espresso machine cleaner for professional espresso machines. Cafetto Espresso Clean has been tested by NSF and certified to protocol P152. This guarantees that Cafetto Espresso Clean will not taint the coffee and is not corrosive to the espresso machine.

description: Made of high fired quality porcelain, the Egg range is strong and durable, while its thick walls are able to maintain beverage temperature and ensure a great taste. The classic choice for professional and home baristas High fired porcelain, durable restaurant grade quality Round inner-base, with a perfect curvature for pouring latte art Available in 10 colours Extra thickness to keep coffee hot The World Latte Art Championship official cups

title: Pullman Tamper (Base + Handle)
description: Simply the best tampers on the planet. Designed and manufactured in Australia, the Pullman Tamper is an ergonomic joy with a comfortable curve running throughout all its components; and now you can build your own with two different base options (58mm & Big Step) and seven colour options (burgundy, cobalt, stealth, forest, argent, oak & jarrah) for the handle. The 58mm base comes with engraved lines on the side of the base to make dosing and tamping consistent every time. In addition, there’s also the option to add one of the three height adjustment spacers between the base and the handle. This feature is supplied with each tamper and provides a total of four different height combinations over an 8mm range. The BigStep base refers to the design of the larger diameter 'stepped edge' of the base, measuring in at 58.55mm (+/- 0.02mm). This base shape enables a maximum surface area of coffee to be covered during tamping, including the prevention of a pinched edge of coffee particles or vacu

title: Batch Brewer Filter Papers
description: If you’ve invested in batch brewing with a Marco Bru unit, then firstly: good decision! title: Pullman Chisel
description: The ultimate tool to improve espresso distribution consistency! Improve distribution consistency by maximising sideways movement of the coffee grounds, with minimal downward pressure. In other words, tamping the least amount of coffee to maximise coffee distribution; also features the nifty addition of an adjustable depth. Specifications: - Step-less depth adjustment - Light-weight (431.5g) - Starts at 6% surface area compression - A “chisel” shape is utilised with a steep angle of the face ensures density of - coffee is not localised - A low-friction contact surface for the spinning action - stainless on stainless – r educing chance of repetitive strain injury - Hand finished base resulting in less static build-up - 316 grade stainless steel - available in black

title: Single Origin Subscription [Filter, Pre-Paid]
description: Let our Roasters select a single origin for you and have it delivered at your desired frequency. You can choose to have delivery once a week, fortnightly or monthly, and what's even better is you get to save 7% to 12% on all your orders. This is an excellent way to explore our rotating range of single origins, and remove the hassle of remembering to order, never be left without great coffee at your home or office again! The charge for Prepaid Subscription will recur after the last shipment. If you do not wish to continue after the final delivery scheduled, please select " Gift Subscription ” checkbox.

title: Brewers Jug & Tasting Cups - Nutty Set
description: Designed by award winning, London-based ceramic artist, Simon Stevens, the Brewers Range has been created to allow you to truly tailor your drinking experience, to get the best from the coffee being brewed. Nutty Tasting Cups create an aroma collector which traps the smells with more earthy coffee such as typical Bolivia or Brazil. Its proven the best tool for chocolate, caramel notes because it provides a perfect nose feel. Available in 3 different artisanal finishes; Carrara, Basalt and Granite Brew directly into the jug - fits almost any drip-style coffee maker Hand-made with authentic pottery-studio glaze Loveramics signature uber-durable body Cups can also be used as Flat White or Piccolo cups Each set includes; 1pc x Specialty Jug (300ml) 2pcs x Tasting Cups (150ml)

title: Coffee Subscription for Blends [Pre-Paid]
description: Make your selection from one of our four, signature specialty coffee blends and we will ensure it is freshly roasted and sent out to you at your desired frequency. To make things easy, here is the flavour profile for each of our blends: 22 Martin Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts & Molasses Lucky Basterd Floral, Blueberries & Tropical Fruit Country Cousin Black Tea, Cherry & Candied Fruit CMCR Espresso Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit & Milk Chocolate Each of our blends lend themselves well to being enjoyed as either a milk-based beverage or as a black, however, if you need a little guidance, our recommendation would be that the blends with chocolate notes will give you a classic milk-based coffee experience, whereas the more fruit dominant blends make for a tasty espresso or long black. The charge for Prepaid Subscription will recur after the last shipment. If you do not wish to continue after the final delivery scheduled, please select " Gift Subscription ” checkbox.

To make things easy, here is the flavour profile for each of our blends: 22 Martin Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts & Molasses Lucky Basterd Floral, Blueberries & Tropical Fruit Country Cousin Black Tea, Cherry & Candied Fruit CMCR Espresso Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit & Milk Chocolate Each of our blends lend themselves well to being enjoyed as either a milk-based beverage or as a black, however, if you need a little guidance, our recommendation would be that the blends with chocolate notes will give you a classic milk-based coffee experience, whereas the more fruit dominant blends make for a tasty espresso or long black. The charge for Prepaid Subscription will recur after the last shipment. If you do not wish to continue after the final delivery scheduled, please select " Gift Subscription ” checkbox.

title: AeroPress Go
description: The AeroPress Go travel coffee maker is engineered to fuel an active lifestyle. It gives coffee lovers everything they need to conveniently brew superb coffee, anywhere they want. Like the original AeroPress, the AeroPress Go brews American-style, espresso, and cold-brew style coffee that can be enjoyed as is or used in a wide range of energizing and refreshing drinks. Delicious coffee anywhere: Optimized for traveling, camping, boating or just at work Simple: Smart design is easy to use and clean up takes seconds Good to Go: Engineered to be the perfect traveler, it is compact, lightweight and durable Superb taste: Free yourself from hotel coffee Includes: Mug with lid, 350 micro-filters in a storage carton, filter cap, filter holder, stirrer and scoop.

title: Brewers Jug & Tasting Cups - Sweet Set
description: Designed by award winning, London-based ceramic artist, Simon Stevens, the Brewers Range has been created to allow you to truly tailor your drinking experience, to get the best from the coffee being brewed. Sweet Tasting Cups is more suitable for a more balanced coffee such as beans from Costa Rica or El Salvador. It provides a good mouth feel to pour the drinks straight into your sweet spot on your tongue. Available in 3 different artisanal finishes; Carrara, Basalt and Granite Brew directly into the jug - fits almost any drip-style coffee maker Hand-made with authentic pottery-studio glaze Loveramics signature uber-durable body Cups can also be used as Flat White or Piccolo cups Each set includes; 1pc x Specialty Jug (300ml) 2pcs x Tasting Cups (150ml)

It provides a good mouth feel to pour the drinks straight into your sweet spot on your tongue. Available in 3 different artisanal finishes; Carrara, Basalt and Granite Brew directly into the jug - fits almost any drip-style coffee maker Hand-made with authentic pottery-studio glaze Loveramics signature uber-durable body Cups can also be used as Flat White or Piccolo cups Each set includes; 1pc x Specialty Jug (300ml) 2pcs x Tasting Cups (150ml)

title: Brewers Jug & Tasting Cups - Sweet Set
description: Designed by award winning, London-based ceramic artist, Simon Stevens, the Brewers Range has been created to allow you to truly tailor your drinking experience, to get the best from the coffee being brewed. Sweet Tasting Cups is more suitable for a more balanced coffee such as beans from Costa Rica or El Salvador. It provides a good mouth feel to pour the drinks straight into your sweet spot on your tongue. Available in 3 different artisanal finishes; Carrara, Basalt and Granite Brew directly into the jug - fits almost any drip-style coffee maker Hand-made with authentic pottery-studio glaze Loveramics signature uber-durable body Cups can also be used as Flat White or Piccolo cups Each set includes; 1pc x Specialty Jug (300ml) 2pcs x Tasting Cups (150ml)

title: Decaf Risaralda, Colombia
description: Tasting Notes: Orange, Prune and Sugar Cane COFFEE INFORMATION Region Paisa Producer Raw Material and Descafecol Altitude 1400 - 1900 MASL Variety Castillo, Caturra, Colombia Processing Washed Decaf Method Natural Ethyl Acetate soaking From our existing relationship of producing partners at Risaralda, Colombia, we're excited to introduce a decaffeinated option for this delicious, sturdy single origin. Risaralda decaf runs through Descafecol, a state of the art decaffeination facility in the Andean region that has a rich source of natural water runoff from Nevado del Ruiz volcano. An organic compound called Ethyl Acetate is used to extract caffeine using a soaking or "caffeine stripping" process. Ethyl Acetate may not sound appetising, potentially chemical-like, but this is a natural and organic chemical compound derived from sugar cane. The natural Ethyl Acetate is obtained from the sugar cane industry around Palmira, Colombia and is, together with spring water, the only other substanc

title: Essential Coffee Knowledge
description: An excellent starter kit for home enthusiasts and new baristas who are looking to journey through the world of Specialty Coffee and embark on the Bean-to-Cup experience. You will be exposed to what goes into crafting the perfect cup of coffee, providing a comprehensive overview of how coffee is grown and processed, and the factors to a coffee’s unique, diverse and complex flavour characteristics. Course Details The class covers the following content: The Coffee Cherry – detailing the differences between Arabica and Robusta species and an introduction to Specialty Coffee Coffee Producing Regions – highlighting how terroir and processing methods play an important role in the flavour differences of major coffee producing countries Roast Profiles – understanding how different roast levels affect flavour and aroma. Objective Attendees will understand and value Specialty Coffee as a quality-focused product, and will be able to distinguish Specialty Coffee from Commodity Coffee. Duration 1.5

title: Camp Cup
description: The original. Classic and iconic in a can’t-go-wrong size In a throwback to the campfire mug of past generations, the MiiR Camp Cup takes on beauty, durability and functionality in one fell swoop, making it loveable for all the right reasons (and impossible to own too many). Care Wash before first use. Hand wash recommended. Lid top rack dishwasher safe. Do not freeze, do not microwave, do not bleach, do not overfill. CHOKING HAZARD May contain small parts not suitable for children under 3 years. Use caution when filled with hot liquids and keep hot liquids out of reach of children. Features Thermo 3D® double-wall vacuum insulation; stays hot, keeps cold Minimalist silhouette with ergonomic handle Durable Hardshell™ powder coat BPA free QR Give Code™ on product base unlocks transparent giving journey

title: Fundamentals of Manual Brewing
description: An alternative to espresso making, this course looks at techniques applicable to both home-brewers and professional baristas alike, jumping that “Third Wave Coffee” bandwagon. This workshop introduces you to filter coffee and guides you through the dialling-in process as we look to maximise the flavour potential of some of the most commonly used pour-over brewers – the Kalita Wave and V60. You can expect to take home some simple yet effective recipes that are sure to give you delicious results on your next brew. Course Details The class contains the following content: Introduction to Filter Coffee – detailing the differences between Pour-over and Immersion brews Brewing Techniques – Pairing right coffee and grind profiles to a pouring technique when building a brewing recipe Quality Evaluation Training – understanding extraction theory and fine-tuning brewing parameters based on visual cues and sensory evaluation Objective Attendee will understand the theory and practical aspects of po

title: Classic Tumbler
description: Grab and never let go of our Tumbler. With a hand feel known to make hearts skip a beat, it draws eyes with an understated silhouette and glorious powder coat finish. Fitting comfortably in cupholders and daily routines alike, the Tumbler flexes to any beverage you fancy while impressively maintaining its temperature. Features Thermo 3D ™ Double Wall Vacuum Insulation Technology 18/8 Medical grade stainless steel doesn't transfer flavor & no metal aftertaste Hardshell™ powder coat (colored tumblers) Lid and cup are BPA free. Press-on lid prevents splashes and keeps drinks warm longer Cup holder compatible

title: Pourigami™
description: Finally, you can enjoy good coffee anywhere! Embrace the trifecta of the award winning MiiR Pourigami™ – the world’s smallest, most durable and portable travel coffee dripper. Fitting in your back pocket when not in use, three stainless steel panels orient and interlock for easy assembly, with machined grooves to ensure perfect placement for a secure pour over coffee. An included case allows for easy storage with room to stash filters for the road. Features Makes single cup pour over Small – 6.2cm x 12.7cm x 2.4mm unassembled, weighs 4oz Durable – 18/8 medical grade stainless steel Portable – includes storage case with room for filters Easy assembly – how-to at MiiR.com/assembly Hardshell™ powder coat Easy to clean – use with Bar Keeper's Friend for best results BPA free – no Bad Plastic Awfulness (or Bisphenol A) here Lifetime warranty

title: Coffee Dripper
description: Through careful and innovative ceramic design, the 3 different Drippers come with distinct embossments to give you even more control when it comes to brewing. There are many variables behind a great brew, and now with any of the 3 Drippers, you can expand your coffee's potential with their varied flow rates and extraction styles. Smooth - Fast flow rate, great for highlighting nuances in acidity and aroma. Recommended for single origins with fruity and floral qualities. Mellow - Medium flow rate, ideal for a balanced and rounded brew. Recommended for single origins with sweeter notes and moderate body. Strong - Slow flow rate, to emphasize the body and mouthfeel. Recommended for single origins with a distinct tactile experience. Behind the design: Simon Stevens is an award-winning product designer and a driving force in ceramic design. Simon has worked with some of the world's most prestigious ceramic manufacturers and has taught and lectured on the subject throughout the UK. He has he

title: Eagle One Prima & Atom Special Edition Grinder
description: Get in touch to purchase Brew a perfect cup of coffee with Victoria Arduino Eagle One Prima and Atom Special Edition Grinder by Eureka. The duo shares the same colour palette and fits beautifully in your home kitchen. The latest release from Victoria Arduino, a stunning single group espresso machine, know as the Eagle One Prima, it’s ready to bring wherever and whenever the ultimate @victoriaarduino1905 coffee experience. The VA team believe it is the first step towards a new frontier, new way to prepare and enjoy espresso coffee. What this encompasses: Auto Purge System NEO (New Engine Optimisation) More energy efficient Cool touch Steam Wand + Ergonomic Steam Lever Direct Connect and plumbed in option Steam By wire - Meaning you can get up to 3 bars of steam pressure App Control - Control temperature, pressure profiling, volumetrics and more via the app We’re yet to see anything close to this much science (and style) go in to an at-home coffee machine, to say we’re excited to have th

title: Fundamentals of Latte Art
description: Baristas, or those who have completed the Fundamental Barista Skills, can look forward to honing their latte art skills in this course. You can expect a rigorous practical session focusing primarily on free-pouring basic latte art patterns – heart, tulip and rosetta. Course Details This class contains the following content: Milk Focused – apply proper milk frothing techniques and understand free-pouring mechanics Pour Analysis – step-by-step guide to achieve desired latte art design and reverse engineering pouring techniques to identify areas for improvements Design Presentation – well-textured, centred and symmetrical Objective Attendee will be able to demonstrate proper milk frothing techniques, understand the art of free-pouring and create basic latte art designs. Duration 2.5 hours Prerequisite Fundamental Barista Skills Location Blk 52 Chin Swee Road, #03-71, S160052 Class Size 1 to 6 pax Cost Per Person S$170

title: Meaningful Green
description: Nourishing & Memorable An unforgettable blend of ancient and wild Green Tea Leaves, Red Clover Blossoms, Lemon Verbena, and Gynostemma Vine. Meaningful Green is exceptionally smooth, with floral, lemon, and sweet nut tones, followed by a refreshing and clean finish. A captivating arrangement of dark jade leaves, bright green herbs, and soft purple blossoms. Antioxidant rich and naturally healthy, this Green Tea will be your new favorite and leave you feeling energised and wanting more. Ingredients Organic Green Tea: Ancient Artisan Baked Heart (~200-year-old trees) Organic Lemon Verbena Organic Red Clover Flower Wildcrafted Gynostemma Vine *Certified organic, May contain traces of pollen *Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct sunlight Preparation method 1g per 100ml of water 90ºC for 1-2 mins Rebrew 2-3 times

title: Renewed in Flames
description: We’ll be honest, the true motivation behind this capsule collection of tee’s was so our roasting crew would have something comfy to wear whilst repping CMCR. With designs put together by Aroka Studio over in Indonesia and production by our friends at Laughing Tiger, the final product turned out too good for us to not share.100% organic cotton, generous fit, practical colours and plenty of design combinations to choose from, grab your fave before we sell out/keep them for ourselves.

title: Organic Earl Grey
description: Hearty & Awakening A blend of 100% organic high-altitude Ceylon Tea Leaves, Pure Bergamot Essential Oil and Corn Flowers. Floral aromas that are instantly recognisable transform into a fine balance of citrus, vanilla, and rich cocoa flavours. Smooth and sweet with a mild and pleasing astringency. The highest quality version of this traditional blend which can be enjoyed on its own while also being robust enough to handle milk if preferred. Ingredients Organic Ceylon Tea Leaves Organic Bergamot Essential Oil Organic Corn Flowers *Certified organic, May contain traces of pollen *Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct sunlight Preparation method 2g per 100ml of water 100ºC for 3-4 mins

title: Travel Lid
description: Take advantage of a variety of lid options and customize, sip and swap to your liking. Our insulated Travel Lid is the perfect addition to any of our Wide Mouth bottles, flipping open for easy access to your beverage and locking when closed for leak-free satisfaction - not to mention it does a splendid job of keeping hot bevies hot and cold bevies cold for longer. Fits all MiiR Travel Tumblers & Wide Mouth collection.

title: Travel Lid
description: Take advantage of a variety of lid options and customize, sip and swap to your liking. Fits all MiiR Travel Tumblers & Wide Mouth collection.

title: Dripper Stand
description: To pair with the Dripper, you may choose from 3 Dripper Stands with different finishes. Keep your Drippers upright, stable, and presentable during brewing. (Bonus: It works with other 3rd party coffee drippers, eg: Origami Drippers, Hario Glass Dripping body) Gold Metallic Matte Black Behind the design: Simon Stevens is an award-winning product designer and a driving force in ceramic design. Simon has worked with some of the world's most prestigious ceramic manufacturers and has taught and lectured on the subject throughout the UK. He has headed up design teams for lifestyle brands and now continues his design career in the established Simon Stevens Design Studio based in London. Simon's dynamic creativity resulted in his most successful designs being in the permanent collections of the Victoria & Albert Museum and the Frankfurt Museum of Applied Art.

title: Herb Garden
description: Refreshing & Uplifting A thoughtful mix of some of the most loved aromatic and healing organic herbs. Herb Garden is a fine balance of sweet, spicy, floral and citrus with a thick full-body, refreshing taste and surprisingly sweet finish. A tisane designed to ignite your taste buds and provide a delicious caffeine-free boost that can be sipped any time of the day. The ingredients in this blend have been used traditionally to help soothe the stomach, reduce inflammation and improve the body’s resistance to stress. Ingredients Organic Ginger Root Organic Licorice Root Organic Lemongrass Organic Fennel Seed Organic Chamomile Flower Organic Peppermint *Certified organic, May contain traces of pollen *Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct sunlight Preparation method 2g per 150ml of water 100ºC for 3-4 mins

title: São Paulo, Brazil
description: Tasting Notes: Toffee, Walnut, and Brown Sugar COFFEE INFORMATION Region Campos das Vertentes Producer José Carlos Cepera Altitude 950 - 1100 MASL Variety Mundo Novo Processing Natural Fazenda São Paulo is situated in Campo das Vertentes, located in Minas Gerais, about 200km south of Belo Horizonte. This lush, vast estate is owned by José Carlos Cepera, a producing partner part of the Sancoffee group. Campo das Vertentes translates to "watershed fields", naming the region that's fortunately located in the middle of two vital water basins in Brazil. Agriculture was established very early on in this region due to fertile soils and access to abundant water. Coffee trees adapted perfectly and have been growing in this area as early as 1860. The people of Campo das Vertentes hold close to their hearts a rich coffee tradition in this unique landscape and microclimate. Our partners at Sancoffee are a collective of growers in this region, focused on empowering the growing community. Encouragin

title: Feel Good Chai Vegan
description: Soothing & Energising Paying tribute to an ancient Indian custom, we bring you our best version of this traditional spiced Black Tea. A selection of 100% organic, sweet, and warming spices are freshly ground and hand blended with WA honey into each batch of Feel Good Chai. Bursting with flavour and full of natural sweetness, it is designed to create a full flavoured chai latte without the need for additional sweeteners of powders. Exotic aromas and unique spice combinations that become distinctly recognisable after the first taste. Ingredients Organic Ceylon Tea Organic Cinnamon Organic Fennel Organic Star Anise Organic Cardamom Organic Ginger Root Organic Vanilla Caviar *Certified organic, May contain traces of pollen *Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct sunlight Preparation method 5g per 100ml of water 100ºC for 3-4 mins Latte: Submerge 12-15g of tea in boiling water for a minimum of 3 minutes. Cover with cold milk, steam and strain to serve.

title: Giesen and Friends
description: We’ll be honest, the true motivation behind this capsule collection of tee’s was so our roasting crew would have something comfy to wear whilst repping CMCR. With designs put together by Aroka Studio over in Indonesia and production by our friends at Laughing Tiger, the final product turned out too good for us to not share.100% organic cotton, generous fit, practical colours and plenty of design combinations to choose from, grab your fave before we sell out/keep them for ourselves.

title: Ruby Breakfast
description: Satisfying & Energising Rise and shine with the ultimate breakfast blend made from 100% organic high-altitude pure Ceylon Tea Leaves. Ruby red in colour, Ruby Breakfast is brisk and full-bodied with distinctly sweet vanilla and woody aromas, subtle citric acidity, and a gentle bittersweet finish. A perfect morning pick-me-up, this versatile blend is delicious on its own while also being robust enough to handle milk if preferred. Ingredients Certified Organic Ceylon Tea Leaves *Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct sunlight. Preparation method 2g per 100ml of water 100ºC for 3-4 mins

title: SG AeroPress Championship '22 Tee x 8EyedSpud
description: The theme for SGAC '22 is "Return to Nature", strengthening our innate connection with the world outside. A fitting reminder that we aren't meant to be holed up indoors and belong to the great outdoors, the perfect AeroPress setting. We've collaborated with local artist 8EyedSpud to amplify our vision. Nat and Jackie (the artist duo) combined the essence of the AeroPress Championships with the awkward feeling of returning to a post-pandemic normal, figuring out how to do outdoor… life things. Riffing off Singapore's tropical vibe, a crowd of palm trees look skeptically down at an Aeropress and his adventure squad that's doing their darndest best to fake it till they make it. With makeshift grass skirts and pasted leaves, they're very proud of their handiwork (as they should be!), despite the disparaging looks around. The tees are printed by our incredible friends Konstrukt Labs. Available in limited quantities. Get yours now! Male Model is 174 cm tall and wears size XL; Female Model is

description: Select from a range of specialty teas that are cultivated mindfully and hand-crafted by Ripple Effect Tea for the avid tea connoisseur. Paired with the Loveramics Bond cup and saucer, an ideal match for cosy tea-time rituals at home.

title: Organic Peppermint
description: Zesty & Stimulating A classic herbal blend that is light, uplifting and naturally caffeine free. Bright lemony citrus notes combined with spicy ginger, make for an invigorating tisane that can be enjoyed any time of the day. Some of its many holistic benefits may include stress relief and soothing of stomach while also aiding with digestion and concentration. Made with 100% certified organic ingredients. Ingredients Certified Organic Peppermint *Store in a cool, dry place and away from direct sunlight Preparation method 2g per 150ml of water 100ºC for 3-4 mins

title: 80ml Embossed Tasting Cup
description: Inspired by the amazing colour palette found on the Rainbow Housing Estate of Hong Kong cityscape, the new Loveramics Brewers Embossed Tasting Cups come in 11 beautiful pastel colours that will compliment anyone's interior be it in your own home or with the decor of your coffee shop. The flared opening of each cup expresses the aroma of your favourite coffee, a shape that is accentuated by the colourful translucent glaze that breaks on the delicate pinstripe embossment of its surface, the wider opening will also let you be creative allowing space for a little latte art.

title: SG AeroPress Championship '22 Tote Bag x 8EyedSpud
description: The theme for SGAC '22 is "Return to Nature", strengthening our innate connection with the world outside. A fitting reminder that we aren't meant to be holed up indoors and belong to the great outdoors, the perfect AeroPress setting. We've collaborated with local artist 8eyedspud to amplify our vision. Nat and Jackie (the artist duo) combined the essence of the AeroPress Championships with the awkward feeling of returning to a post-pandemic normal, figuring out how to do outdoor… life things. Riffing off Singapore's tropical vibe, a crowd of palm trees look skeptically down at an Aeropress and his adventure squad that's doing their darndest best to fake it till they make it. With makeshift grass skirts and pasted leaves, they're very proud of their handiwork (as they should be!), despite the disparaging looks around. The tote bags are hand-printed by our incredible friends Konstrukt Labs. Available in limited quantities. Get yours now!

title: Limited Edition: Gold Dripper Set
description: With limited availability worldwide, Loveramics pays homage to the golden era of the coffee industry with its "Gold Version" coffee dripping set. The set features all 3 Dripper types, 'Strong, Smooth, Mellow,' a 'Brass Stand' and a '500ml Straight Glass Jug'. Smooth - Highlighting nuances in acidity and aroma. Pairs well with fruity, floral, and delicate coffee qualities. Mellow - Ideal for balanced and rounded brews. Pairs well with sweet, ripe, and mild coffee qualities. Strong - Emphasizes body and mouthfeel. Pairs well with nutty, chocolate, and heavier coffee qualities.

title: Flatbed Coffee Dripper
description: The Loveramics newly designed embossed dripper is meticulously crafted to elevate your pour-over coffee experience. The innovative embossment creates subtle spacing between the paper and dripper, while the floral-shaped drain hole increases the brewing area by 120%. This results in faster brew times and enhances the sweetness and flavour clarity of your brew. Available in 13 new colours, the dripper complements well with the Loveramics Brewers Embossed Tasting Cup, adding a seamless aesthetic to your brew bar. For the best cup, the recommended brew test uses 18-25g of coffee with a water ratio of 1:12-15.

title: PuqPress Mini
description: Introducing the PuqPress Mini: the world’s first precision coffee tamper. Let it handle the pressure while you can focus on the grind and extraction game! Perfect for homes, offices, and small cafes serving up to 100 coffees a day.

title: 500ml Zigzag Glass Jug
description: Our glass jugs are heat-proof & made from Boro-silicate glass. They work perfectly with the dripper stand & many universal drippers that have the stand attached. Intentionally made thicker for durability in the busy café environment.

title: Egg 200ml Cappuccino Cup &  Saucer Set (Nature Series)
description: The Loveramics Egg Series are the official cups of the World Latte Art Championship. Designed and crafted to the smallest detais, the cups allow every speciality coffee to develop its fill flavour well with the best quality, meeting the demands of coffee lovers and baristas. This new series is inspired by nature, with 5 new glazes in earthy, neutral tones glazed in matte. Its functional round base, it allows a fuller flavour to develop, enhancing aromas and tastes of coffee to perfect balance. The ergonomic handle and saucer is created to ensure an aesthetic balance at your brew bar or cafes. With a wall that is thick, the cup keeps coffee at the right temperature. This 200ml cup and saucer set is most used in professional coffee house, for cappuccinos with a strong ratio of coffee / milk. Dimension: Cup - Length 11.5cm, Width 9.5cm, Height 5.5cm Saucer - Diameter 14.5cm, Height 2.5cm

title: 200ml Modern Colour Changing Cupping Bowl
description: Loveramics have combined their high quality, high-temperature fired porcelain with a unique, heat-reactive glazing, that changes colour as it cools! With a set of 6 bowls, you're all set to explore some delicious coffees. Add a bit of drama to your next cupping, whilst staying true to your process with highly accurate, quality manufacturing Elegantly turning white at the addition of 95c water Light-Grey marks the passing of 70c (4 mins) when the crust is ready to break Dark-Grey at 60c (8 mins) means it's ready to cup!

title: Egg 300ml Latte Cup &  Saucer Set (Nature Series)
description: The Loveramics Egg Series are the official cups of the World Latte Art Championship. Designed and crafted to the smallest detais, the cups allow every speciality coffee to develop its fill flavour well with the best quality, meeting the demands of coffee lovers and baristas. This new series is inspired by nature, with 5 new glazes in earthy, neutral tones glazed in matte. Its functional round base, it allows a fuller flavour to develop, enhancing aromas and tastes of coffee to perfect balance. The ergonomic handle and saucer is created to ensure an aesthetic balance at your brew bar or cafes. With a wall that is thick, the cup keeps coffee at the right temperature. This 300ml cup and saucer set is the used at the World Latte Art Championship, with the biggest area for latte art. Dimension: Cup - Length 13.5cm, Width 11.0cm, Height 6.5cm Saucer - Diameter 15.5cm, Height 2.5cm

title: AeroPress XL
description: The iconic coffee press, made with the same patented technology, now with double the capacity. Discover the simplest and quickest way to brew coffee with AeroPress' innovative 3-in-1 brew technology, combining the best brewing methods into one portable device. With its increased capacity, you can now enjoy on-the-go coffee with friends during road trips! Durable and lightweight, it's perfect for packing in your bag. Complete with a stirring paddle, measuring scoop, funnel, and filter papers, it's your all-in-one brewing solution. Plus, receive a 20 oz carafe made of crystal-clear, shatterproof Tritan™ for added convenience.

title: AeroPress Clear
description: Experience the AeroPress coffee press, made with AeroPress' patented technology in durable, shatterproof Tritan™. Sleek enough for display, tough enough for any adventure. Discover one of the simplest and quickest ways to brew coffee. The innovative 3-in-1 brew technology combines the best elements of various brewing methods into one effortlessly portable device. Complete with a stirring paddle, measuring scoop, funnel, and filter papers, it's your all-in-one brewing solution.

title: AeroPress Stainless Steel Filter
description: Richer coffee is just one press away with AeroPress' reusable metal coffee filter. It effectively filters out grounds while allowing flavorful oils to pass through, delivering a delicious, full-bodied brew. Compatible with AeroPress Original, AeroPress Clear and AeroPress Go coffee makers.

title: Crowd Favourites
description: Can't decide which coffee to try? Discover your new favourite with our bundle featuring a collection of our best selling coffees! Taste the specialty coffee you've enjoyed at our cafes, now in the comfort of your own home. Perfect for finding the ideal beans to brew at home, it's also a great gift for any coffee lover in your life! What's included: 1. 22 Martin Blend (125g) Our signature blend and homage to classic coffee flavours - taste Chocolate, Hazelnuts and Molasses for a richer blend. 2. CMCR Espresso Blend (125g) All you need with the incredible complexity of flavours - taste Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit and Milk Chocolate. 3. Santo Antonio, Brazil (125g) This coffee comes from a collection of well organised estates based around the small town of Santo Antonio do Amparo in the south of the state of Minas Gerais. Taste Dark Chocolate, Cacao and Nougat. 4. São Paulo, Brazil (125g) Grown from a coffee farm in Fazenda São Paulo, which is situated in Campo das Vertentes, located in Mina

title: Cappuccino Lover Bundle
description: Our curated bundle featuring our best-selling blends, perfect for cappuccinos. 22 Martin Blend is our homage to those classic coffee flavours, with tasting notes of Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts, and Molasses with a lingering finish. CMCR Espresso is the blend that you need if you are looking for an incredible complexity of flavours, with tasting notes of Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit, and Milk Chocolate. This set includes the latest 200ml egg cup and saucer from Loveramics' nature series. Choose from 5 earthy, neutral glazes in matte. The functional round base allows fuller flavour development, enhancing the aromas and taste of your coffee for the perfect balance.

CMCR Espresso is the blend that you need if you are looking for an incredible complexity of flavours, with tasting notes of Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit, and Milk Chocolate. This set includes the latest 200ml egg cup and saucer from Loveramics' nature series. Choose from 5 earthy, neutral glazes in matte. The functional round base allows fuller flavour development, enhancing the aromas and taste of your coffee for the perfect balance.

title: Egg 250ml Cappuccino Cup & Saucer Set (Nature Series)
description: The Loveramics Egg Series are the official cups of the World Latte Art Championship. Designed and crafted to the smallest detais, the cups allow every speciality coffee to develop its fill flavour well with the best quality, meeting the demands of coffee lovers and baristas. This new series is inspired by nature, with 5 new glazes in earthy, neutral tones glazed in matte. Its functional round base, it allows a fuller flavour to develop, enhancing aromas and tastes of coffee to perfect balance. The ergonomic handle and saucer is created to ensure an aesthetic balance at your brew bar or cafes. With a wall that is thick, the cup keeps coffee at the right temperature. This 250ml cup and saucer set is most used in professional coffee house, for cappuccinos with a strong ratio of coffee / milk. Dimension: Cup - Length 12.5cm, Width 10.0cm, Height 6.0cm Saucer - Diameter 15.5cm, Height 2.5cm

title: Signature Blend - Coffee Subscription
description: Make your selection from one of our four, signature specialty coffee blends and we will ensure it is freshly roasted and sent out to you at your desired frequency. To make things easy, here is the flavour profile for each of our blends: 22 Martin Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts & Molasses Lucky Basterd Floral, Blueberries & Tropical Fruit Country Cousin Black Tea, Cherry & Candied Fruit CMCR Espresso Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit & Milk Chocolate Each of our blends lend themselves well to being enjoyed as either a milk-based beverage or as a black, however if you need a little guidance, our recommendation would be that the blends with chocolate notes will give you a classic rich and full bodied milk-based coffee experience, whereas the more fruit dominant blends make for a tasty espresso or long black.

title: AeroPress Paper Micro-Filters - XL
description: Smooth, grit-free coffee Designed for use with the AeroPress XL coffee maker, our paper micro-filters are an essential part of the brewing process that keep grounds from entering your cup.

description: Let our Roasters select a single origin for you and have it delivered at your desired frequency. You can choose to have delivery once a week, fortnightly or monthly, and what's even better is you get to save 5% on all your orders. title: Cascara by Finca El Porvenir, Colombia
description: Region: Cauca, Popayan Producer: Diego Triana Altitude: 1700 - 1900 MASL Process: Natural Drying Variety: Tabi Tasting Notes: Roselle, Prune, Hawthorn Berry About Finca El Porvenir Cascara begins with the coffee cherry—much more than just the source of our beloved beans. At Finca El Porvenir, once the cherries are depulped, their skin—cascara—is carefully collected and dried, transforming what was once a by-product into something remarkable. Cascara offers a flavour profile all its own: naturally sweet, with notes of dried fruits, florals, and honey. Its light body and gentle acidity make it a refreshing brew, whether steeped hot or cold, with a warm amber hue and flavours true to the essence of the coffee cherry. Finca El Porvenir, overseen by Diego Triana, sits in Colombia’s Cauca region, where volcanic soil and cool mountain air come together at altitudes between 1700 and 1900 metres above sea level. The farm cultivates varietals such as Castillo, Caturra, Pink Bourbon, and Tabi. Th

The set consists of: 1 x Loveramics Flatbed Dripper in the colour of your choice 1 x 500ml Loveramics Belly Glass Jug 1 x Loveramics Dripper Stand in Metallic 1 x Kalita Filter Papers (100 pcs) 1 x UnCommon Filter Coffee

title: Signature Blend - Coffee Subscription
description: Make your selection from one of our four, signature specialty coffee blends and we will ensure it is freshly roasted and sent out to you at your desired frequency. To make things easy, here is the flavour profile for each of our blends: 22 Martin Dark Chocolate, Hazelnuts & Molasses Lucky Basterd Floral, Blueberries & Tropical Fruit Country Cousin Black Tea, Cherry & Candied Fruit CMCR Espresso Ripe Cherry, Stone Fruit & Milk Chocolate Each of our blends lend themselves well to being enjoyed as either a milk-based beverage or as a black, however if you need a little guidance, our recommendation would be that the blends with chocolate notes will give you a classic rich and full bodied milk-based coffee experience, whereas the more fruit dominant blends make for a tasty espresso or long black.

title: Single Origin  [Espresso Roast] - Coffee Subscription
description: Let our Roasters select a single origin for you and have it delivered at your desired frequency. You can choose to have delivery once a week, fortnightly or monthly, and what's even better is you get to save 5% on all your orders. This is an excellent way to explore our rotating range of single origins, and remove the hassle of remembering to order, never be left without great coffee at your home or office again!

title: 120ml Boram Um Tasting Cups
description: Boram Um is the World Barista Champion in 2023. He represents Brazil in the world stage, and was crowned the final winner. Boram comes from coffee producing background, in which his family owns a coffee farm in the State of Minas Gerais in Brazil. In this collaboration, he works with Loveramics exclusively for this special edition of Brewers' cups, which is determined to bring extra sweetness to your drinking experience. Boram designs the cups to have a wider base, creating more balance and harmony with while focusing on the sweetness of coffee. The result is a set of cups available in 80ml, 120ml, and 200ml sizes that will elevate Boram's competition set to champion status. Materials: Porcelain Dimensions: 8 x 8 x 4.5 cm Weight: 143 g Vol: 120 mL Designer: Boram Um DishwasherSafe, MicrowaveSafe, FreezerSafe, OvenSafe, Stackable

title: Coffee Tasting & Sensory Analysis
description: This course is designed to be intuitive and engaging for participants of all experience levels, from casual coffee drinkers to home baristas and professionals. Through guided sensory exercises, participants will taste curated coffee sets with contrasting flavor profiles, allowing them to identify and articulate the complex sensory qualities of specialty coffee. By the end of the session, they will have the confidence and skills to effectively describe their sensory experiences. Course Details The class contains the following content: Coffee Cupping & Sensory Analysis – set up and conduct a coffee cupping session following the Specialty Coffee Association’s Coffee Value Assessment (CVA) protocol. Explain Intrinsic Qualities of Coffee – using coffee flavor wheel and CVA Combined Form. Sensory Attribute Interaction – analyse how sensory attributes shape the overall profile of coffee. Objective Participants will learn to communicate their sensory experiences using the Specialty Coffee Asso

title: Ethiopia Aricha Capsules
description: This specific lot from Aricha is sourced and handpicked from over 450 farmers, where the coffee then gets carefully managed and fermented up to 72 hours. Hitting the sips with a bright yet tea-like profile on it's own, this one might turn heads for the casual coffee capsule drinkers. Delightful on its own, with a unique sweetness that comes through with a hit of milk.

title: Bundle: Essential Coffee Knowledge + Fundamental Barista Skills
description: Course Details Duration 4 - 4.5 hours Prerequisite N.A. Location Blk 52 Chin Swee Road, #03-71, S160052 Class Size 1 to 12 pax Cost Per Person S$230 Essential Coffee Knowledge An excellent starter kit for home enthusiasts and new baristas who are looking to journey through the world of Specialty Coffee and embark on the Bean-to-Cup experience. You will be exposed to what goes into crafting the perfect cup of coffee, providing a comprehensive overview of how coffee is grown and processed, and the factors to a coffee’s unique, diverse and complex flavour characteristics. This class covers the following content: The Coffee Cherry – detailing the differences between Arabica and Robusta species and an introduction to Specialty Coffee Coffee Producing Regions – highlighting how terroir and processing methods play an important role in the flavour differences of major coffee producing countries Roast Profiles – understanding how different roast levels affect flavour and aroma. Fundamental Bari

title: Brewista 1L Electric Gooseneck Kettle
description: Perfecting your morning coffee routine begins with the Artisan Kettle. Brewista’s thoughtfully engineered design offers precise, degree-specific temperature control for an ideal brew every time. Built with craftsmanship and precision, the Artisan is a favorite among expert baristas worldwide and coffee enthusiasts seeking a more refined brewing experience. Comfort and Style The unique balanced handle design created by the Brewista’s in-house design team gives you a full range of flow control and superior balance for a more precise brewing experience. Quick Heat Time A blazing fast heat time, powered by a 1200 Watt current means even less time spent waiting in pursuit of the perfect cup. Control and Elegance Designed to be functional and eye-catching, the Gooseneck Spout delivers a spill-free water flow control so you can perfectly unlock the flavor of your beans with slower or faster pours. Simplicity and Accuracy Complete control over your heat, for total control of your coffee. Our L

title: Toddy Go Brewer
description: Ready for wherever life takes you, the Toddy® Go Brewer lets you enjoy cold brew under the stars, on the beach, in the mountains, and even in those daylong meetings during work travel. Just say no to substandard hotel coffee. Brew up to 25 ounces (0.75L) of delicious ready-to-drink cold brewed coffee or tea. Designed with convenient internal Brew and Fill lines, the Toddy® Go simplifies the art of mobile cold brewing. Leave the measuring cups at home! Crafted from brewer's-grade stainless steel, the reusable Toddy® Go Brewer is sized to accommodate most of the cold brew coffee pitcher packs on the market and built to keep cold brew cold and hot drinks hot. The Toddy® Go Brewer is virtually indestructible, dishwasher-safe, and BPA-free. What's Included Brewing vessel 10-pack SB filters Toddy Cinch Instructions

description: Boram Um is the World Barista Champion in 2023. He represents Brazil in the world stage, and was crowned the final winner. Boram comes from coffee producing background, in which his family owns a coffee farm in the State of Minas Gerais in Brazil. In this collaboration, he works with Loveramics exclusively for this special edition of Brewers' cups, which is determined to bring extra sweetness to your drinking experience. Boram designs the cups to have a wider base, creating more balance and harmony with while focusing on the sweetness of coffee. The result is a set of cups available in 80ml, 120ml, and 200ml sizes that will elevate Boram's competition set to champion status. Materials: Porcelain Dimensions: 9.5 x 9.5 x 5.5 cm Weight: 200 g Vol: 200 mL Designer: Boram Um DishwasherSafe, MicrowaveSafe, FreezerSafe, OvenSafe, Stackable

title: Brewista Smart Scale 3.0
description: The Brewista Smart Scale III is a USB-C rechargeable Smart Scale to revolutionize your kitchen experience with its innovative features and sleek design. Designed to excel at espresso, whether it be in a café setting or at home, the Smart Scale III can also handle pour-over with ease. The small footprint allows this scale to be used under many common home espresso setups (including the Flair), and is also good for AeroPress or brewing single cups of coffee into a mug/small server. Features include: Easily adjust to zero when an empty container is placed on scale. Easily track brew time for precise recipes Automatically powers off when not in use Saves energy and extends battery life Five User Modes Use your unit preferences (grams or ounces) Capacity of 2000 grams (70 ounces) Accuracy of +/- 0.1 gram Portafilter holder for easy double-spout espresso pulls Perfect for many ingredient and cooking tasks Protective Cover and Silicone Pad Silicone pad resists water and temperature changes

title: Advanced Manual Brewing
description: The Advanced Manual Brewing course is ideal for brewers looking to refine their skills and create customized coffee recipes. Learners will dive into the science of extraction, analyze brewing devices, and fine-tune their brewing techniques to optimize flavor, helping them elevate their coffee-making to the next level. Course Details The class contains the following content: Identifying Intrinsic Qualities of Coffee – through cupping to assess and establish the sensory profile of coffee. Applying Principles of Brewing – to modulate the intrinsic qualities of the coffee. Analyse Sensory Attributes of Brewed Coffee – to determine necessary brew adjustments. Apply Different Brewing Theories and Concepts – examining its impact on shaping the coffee's overall profile Objective Attendee will learn to create customized brewing recipes by understanding coffee's qualities, the impact of brewing devices, and applying brewing science to optimise flavour. Duration 3 hours Prerequisite Fundamentals

title: Konga Wete, Ethiopia
description: Region: Gediyo, Yirgacheffe Producer: Smallholders Altitude: 1999 MASL Process: Natural Variety: 74110, 74112, 74165 Tasting Notes: Blueberry, Floral, Caramel About Konga Wete Yirgacheffe is a renowned coffee region for good reason. In the highlands of Gediyo, the village of Konga Wete sits at over 2,000 metres above sea level—an altitude that shapes the vibrant, layered nature of this coffee. Here, 1,890 smallholder farmers cultivate ‘garden coffee’ in their backyards, carrying forward Ethiopia’s deep tradition. Working harmoniously with the land, these farmers cultivate three prominent Jimma Agricultural Research Centre (JARC) varieties: 74110, 74112, and 74165. These trees flourish under natural shade, nourished by the Toracho River. Amederaro Konga Washing Station is the heart of this coffee community. Established in 2018, this 2.5-hectare station is just six kilometres from Yirgacheffe town. It serves as a hub for specialised processing and forward-thinking experimentation, employ

title: Breville Discovery Session
description: Just bought a Breville? Join our Breville Discovery Session — a hands-on class designed exclusively for our customers to help you master your machine and elevate your home coffee experience. In this engaging session, you’ll learn how to: Understand and maximize key Breville functionalities Brew café-quality espresso with expert techniques Perfect the art of milk steaming for velvety lattes and cappuccinos Keep your machine in top shape with essential cleaning and maintenance tips Whether you're a beginner or a budding home barista, this workshop will give you the skills and confidence to get the most out of every cup. Course Details Session Overview Key Functionality Brewing espresso Milk Steaming Techniques Proper cleaning and maintenance Objective This workshop is designed to help you unlock the full potential of your Breville machine. You'll learn how to brew rich, balanced espresso, master milk steaming techniques for café-quality drinks, and keep your machine in top condition with

title: Muje Mesina, Ethiopia
description: Region: East Guji Producer: Smallholders Altitude: 1980 MASL Process: Washed Variety: 74110, 74112, 74165 Tasting Notes: Black Tea, Berry, Raisin About Muje Mesina Just 17 kilometres from Adola town in southern Ethiopia lies the village of Muje, a thriving coffee-growing community in East Guji. Here, nearly 2,000 smallholder farmers cultivate what is locally known as “garden coffee,” a testament to Ethiopia’s deep-rooted coffee culture. These farmers contribute to a legacy celebrated for producing some of the world’s most extraordinary coffees. Their harvests are delivered to the Muje Mesina washing station, located beside the Awata River—a vital resource enabling the production of high-quality washed coffees. Ethiopian coffee is naturally organic. Traditional practices and native landrace varieties thrive with minimal intervention, creating harmony between the coffee trees and their environment. This coffee is an excellent example, showcasing vibrant acidity, dense fruit flavours, and

title: Drip Bags - Finca Cerro San Luis, Costa Rica (6 pcs)
description: Region: San Luis de Grecia, Alajuela Producer: Magali & Alexander Delgado Altitude: 1500 - 1700 MASL Process: Honey Variety: SL28 Tasting Notes: Cherry Plum, Stewed Fruits, Mixed Berries About Finca Cerro San Luis, Cerro San Luis is located in the region of San Luis de Grecia, Alajuela, within the Cordillera Volcánica Central of Costa Rica's Central Valley. The legacy of this estate spans three generations of the Delgado family. Siblings Magali and Alexander Delgado inherited the 45-hectare farm from their father, having spent their youth surrounded by coffee and a deep love for its cultivation. When harvest season arrived around Christmas and schools closed, the entire family would harvest coffee together until March. Traditionally, farmers sold their cherries to local cooperatives, but this became increasingly unprofitable over time. Alexander realized that to secure a sustainable future, they needed their own mill. The Cerro San Luis Micromill enabled them to control both processing

title: El Diviso Tabi & Java, Colombia
description: Region: Huila Producer: Nestor Neffer Lasso Zuñiga Altitude: 1750 - 1800 MASL Process: Washed Variety: Tabi, Java Tasting Notes: Floral, Black Tea, Berry About El Diviso Only a few farms have come to fame so exponentially in such a short time like El Diviso, and it is now a household name for barista and brewer competitions on the world stage. Nestor Lasso was only 25 years old when he took over his family farm with his brother, Adrian. El Diviso was founded by Jose Uribe, their grandfather. Finca El Diviso is not only a farm, but a place for discovery and experimentation into new varieties, farming, and processing that push the boundaries of sensory experience in specialty coffee. El Diviso is celebrated for their impeccably crafted microlots, from 15 hectares of farmland dedicated to their pursuit of coffee excellence. Nestor and Adrian Lasso frequently collaborate with local and international experts, and are part of Colombia's next generation of young coffee farmers investing their

title: Dusangirijambo, Burundi
description: Region: Maruri Hill, Kayanza Producer: Dusangirijambo Collective Altitude: 1800 - 1900 MASL Process: Washed Variety: Bourbon Tasting Notes: Juicy Citrus, Dark Chocolate, Roasted Almond About Dusangirijambo Dusangirijambo means “Let's bring our ideas together” in Kirundi, the local Burundian dialect. This farmer cooperative started in 2007 and today has 3,000 contributing members, over 1,000 of whom are women, which is a notable figure in an agricultural sector that has historically been predominantly male-owned. Dusangirijambo was formed with the purpose of promoting and developing the farming community. Since its conception, Dusangirijambo has built washing stations closer to farmers, helped increase yields through agricultural inputs, and improved farmer income through direct coffee market connections. title: Huila, Colombia
description: Region: Garzon, Huila Producer: Farmer Collective Altitude: 1300 - 1900 MASL Process: Washed Variety: Caturra, Castillo, Colombia, Bourbon Tasting Notes: Caramel, Panela, Red Fruits About Huila In the late 1800s, a nationwide initiative to strengthen Colombia’s agricultural economy saw Arabica coffee introduced to several regions, including Huila. Smallholders in and around Garzon, Huila started growing coffee alongside other cash crops like sugarcane and maize. With the Andean foothills surrounding Garzon, coffee can be found growing as low as 1300 and as high as 1900 meters above sea level, offering a diverse range in cultivar and quality. Together with volcanic soil and stable rainfall, the region is prime for consistently producing fine regional and micro-lots. Garzon serves as a hub for collecting coffee from smaller nearby towns and rural farms—an essential transit point for smallholders in the region. From the 70s to 90s, volatile global coffee prices paired with armed civil con

title: Brewista 600ml Electric Gooseneck Kettle
description: Perfecting your morning coffee routine begins with the Artisan Kettle. Brewista’s thoughtfully engineered design offers precise, degree-specific temperature control for an ideal brew every time. Built with craftsmanship and precision, the Artisan is a favorite among expert baristas worldwide and coffee enthusiasts seeking a more refined brewing experience. Comfort and Style The unique balanced handle design created by the Brewista’s in-house design team gives you a full range of flow control and superior balance for a more precise brewing experience. Quick Heat Time A blazing fast heat time, powered by a 1200 Watt current means even less time spent waiting in pursuit of the perfect cup. Control and Elegance Designed to be functional and eye-catching, the Gooseneck Spout delivers a spill-free water flow control so you can perfectly unlock the flavor of your beans with slower or faster pours. Simplicity and Accuracy Complete control over your heat, for total control of your coffee. Our L

title: Tuang Colol, Indonesia
description: Region: Flores Producer: Smallholder Altitude: 1600 MASL Process: Washed Variety: Kartika Tasting Notes: Pomelo, Starfruit, Brown Sugar About Tuang Colol Flores is a small island in the East Nusa Tenggara province, its name shortened from Cabo de Flores, given by Portuguese sailors in the 17th century. While not one of Indonesia’s largest producing islands, its unique geography and history offer a lesser-known coffee that has the ability to shine on its own with the right care. Despite its small size, Flores is home to mountain chains and active volcanoes, which can be a blessing for the fertile lands but have also wrought devastation on infrastructure and communities. Traditionally, coffee is only known as a low-end commodity to the island’s locals. Several initiatives from international and local traders work closely with the Flores people to improve cup quality and bring their coffee to a wider market, including the partners we sourced this coffee from, Tuang Coffee. Tuang Coffee is

Despite its small size, Flores is home to mountain chains and active volcanoes, which can be a blessing for the fertile lands but have also wrought devastation on infrastructure and communities. Traditionally, coffee is only known as a low-end commodity to the island’s locals. Several initiatives from international and local traders work closely with the Flores people to improve cup quality and bring their coffee to a wider market, including the partners we sourced this coffee from, Tuang Coffee. Tuang Coffee is

title: CMCR x Cruddy CSNC Housewarming Puffy Stickers
description: Bring Chin Swee charm into your day to day. These puffy stickers are made to stick on bottles, laptops, notebooks, or anywhere that could use a touch of warmth. Playful, collectible, and unmistakably CSNC, they are a reminder of the little things that make the neighbourhood feel like home.

title: Finca Cerro San Luis, Costa Rica
description: Region: San Luis de Grecia, Alajuela Producer: Magali & Alexander Delgado Altitude: 1500 - 1700 MASL Process: Honey Variety: SL28 Tasting Notes: Cherry Plum, Stewed Fruits, Mixed Berries About Finca Cerro San Luis, Cerro San Luis is located in the region of San Luis de Grecia, Alajuela, within the Cordillera Volcánica Central of Costa Rica's Central Valley. The legacy of this estate spans three generations of the Delgado family. Siblings Magali and Alexander Delgado inherited the 45-hectare farm from their father, having spent their youth surrounded by coffee and a deep love for its cultivation. When harvest season arrived around Christmas and schools closed, the entire family would harvest coffee together until March. Traditionally, farmers sold their cherries to local cooperatives, but this became increasingly unprofitable over time. Alexander realized that to secure a sustainable future, they needed their own mill. The Cerro San Luis Micromill enabled them to control both processing

title: CoopeAgri, Costa Rica
description: Region: Perez Zeledon, Brunca Producer: COOPEAGRI Farmers Altitude: 1100 - 1500 MASL Process: Washed Variety: Caturra, Catuai Tasting Notes: Hazelnut Spread, Stone Fruit, Brown Sugar About CoopeAgri CoopeAgri is a farmer co-operative that was founded in 1962 in Perez Zeledon, Costa Rica. Beginning with 391 farmers in the region, the co-operative continued to grow rapidly into one of Costa Rica's largest mills. Today, there are over 10,000 co-op members, reaching more than 35,000 farmers of all sizes and accounting for 12% of all of Costa Rica's coffee producers. Although the region has a rich history in agriculture, after the devastation of the 1948 Costa Rican Civil War, public infrastructure in the region was left in poor condition. Private companies with business interests in the region did little to improve Perez Zeledon's community prospects for recovery throughout the 1950s. It wasn’t until a group of generals acknowledged the needs of the region’s neglected coffee growers, who s
